title: Textile, "Nucleus", 1976
medium:
Medium: cotton 
Technique: double cloth (two interlocked plain weave structures)
dimensions: Warp x Weft (selvedge to selvedge): 47.6 x 43.2 cm (18 3/4 x 17 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of Textiles Fund
description: Small scale checkerboard pattern in multiple solid and mixed colors, using close values and hues to create optical illusions at various distances.
